simple

Class simple

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.simple

  • public class simple
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a simple 3D rendering application using the 3D rendering API provided by the package jrtr. Opens a 3D rendering window and shows a rotating cube.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  simple.AnimationTask
      A timer task that generates an animation.
      static class  simple.SimpleKeyListener
      A key listener for the main window.
      static class  simple.SimpleMouseListener
      A mouse listener for the main window.
      static class  simple.SimpleRenderPanel
      An extension of GLRenderPanel or SWRenderPanel to provide a call-back function for initialization.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main function opens a window 3D rendering window, implemented by the class simple.SimpleRenderPanel. simple.SimpleRenderPanel.init(jrtr.RenderContext) is then called backed for initialization automatically by the Java event dispatching thread (EDT), see this discussion on stackoverflow and this explanation on wikipedia. Additional event listeners are added to handle mouse and keyboard events from the EDT. simple.SimpleRenderPanel.init(jrtr.RenderContext) constructs a simple 3D scene, and starts a timer task to generate an animation.
